name: Galactic Invaders (Space Invaders)
description:
Galactic Invaders,  although a 'remake' of Space Invaders, it has a twist to it.
  • The way enemies come into the screen is different from Space Invaders.
  • Every X seconds, the game becomes more difficult.
  • For each enemy you kill you gain 1 point.
  • You have 3 life and if you get hit by a bullet,  you lose health. 
  • If a enemy passes you, you lose one point.
  • Ship upgrades
    • Can increase ship speed
    • Can increase shooting speed
  • Kill enemies to earn points
  • Ship selection
Full in game controller support.
  • A and D to move, or left joy stick on Xbox controller
  • Space to shoot, or A on Xbox controller
  • Xbox controller vibration
